content:
Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a furnace, I need to place 8 blackstone or cobblestone in a U shape in the crafting grid. Since I have both blackstone and cobblestone in my inventory, I will start by placing the cobblestone in the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: The next step is to place another cobblestone in the top middle slot (slot 2) of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I will place the last cobblestone in the top right corner of the crafting grid (slot 3).
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that all the cobblestone has been placed, I can start placing the blackstone. I will start by placing one blackstone in the bottom left corner of the crafting grid (slot 4).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I will place another blackstone in the bottom middle slot (slot 6) of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 6 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: Finally, I will place the last blackstone in the bottom right corner of the crafting grid (slot 7).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that all the ingredients have been placed in the crafting grid, I can craft the furnace by moving it from the crafting grid (slot 0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 8 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the furnace has been crafted, I can move it to the crafting grid (slot 0) to use it.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 9 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "furnace", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 41, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the furnace has been crafted, I can move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
